# Example Voting App

Example Voting App based on the original example from Docker: [github.com/dockersamples/example-voting-app](https://github.com/dockersamples/example-voting-app)

## Deploy the App on Oracle Cloud Infrasctructure using only APIs end-to-end (OCI APIs and Kubernetes APIs)

[![Run in Postman](https://run.pstmn.io/button.svg)](https://app.getpostman.com/run-collection/29850-f9bfdc5c-5f57-4c7a-8e5c-46d3ccb252d2?action=collection%2Ffork&collection-url=entityId%3D29850-f9bfdc5c-5f57-4c7a-8e5c-46d3ccb252d2%26entityType%3Dcollection%26workspaceId%3D7beb96db-3916-446a-a90a-adc4ce631755#?env%5BOCI%20Credentials%)

No need to install clients or create Service Accounts. Just get the creedentials from your OCI tenancy and start making API calls.
